title: Water (disambiguation)
content:
Water may refer to:

  • Water, a liquid.
  • Water source, spots to fill containers with water.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Waterfiend
  • Water elemental
  • Water wizard

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Elemental staves:
    • Staff of water
    • Water battlestaff
    • Mystic water staff
  • The Fremennik Trials items:
    • 1/5ths full bucket
    • 2/5ths full bucket
    • 3/5ths full bucket
    • 4/5ths full bucket
    • Full bucket
    • Vase of water
  • Blank water rune, used in The Slug Menace quest.
  • Blessed water, used in the Priest in Peril quest.
  • Bottled water, used in The Hand in the Sand quest.
  • Bowl of water
  • Bowl of hot water
  • Bowl of blue water, used in Trouble Brewing.
  • Bowl of red water, used in Trouble Brewing.
  • Bucket of water
  • Bucket of water, used in the Darkness of Hallowvale quest.
  • Bucket of water, used in the Rum Deal quest.
  • Cup of water
  • Cup of hot water
  • Full bucket, used in the Icthlarin's Little Helper quest.
  • Holy water, used in the Legends' Quest.
  • Jug of water
  • Murky water, used in the Priest in Peril quest.
  • Nettle-water, used to make nettle tea.
  • Vial of water
  • Vial of water, used in the Lunar Diplomacy quest.
  • Watering can
  • Waterskin
  • Water orb
  • Water rune
  • Water rune pack
  • Water rune, used in The Slug Menace quest.
  • Water talisman
  • Water tiara
  • Water-filled gourd vial, used in the Chambers of Xeric.
  • Water-filled vial pack

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Construction objects:
    • Pond
    • Pump and drain
    • Pump and tub
    • Sink
    • Small fountain
    • Large fountain
    • Posh fountain
  • Water spells:
    • Water Strike
    • Water Bolt
    • Water Blast
    • Water Wave
    • Water Surge
  • Charge Water Orb, a spell.
  • Fountain of Heroes
  • Humidify, a spell that can create water.
  • Obelisk of Water, an elemental obelisk.
  • Sea
  • Waterfall, a music track.
  • Waterfall Dungeon, a location.
  • Waterfall Quest, a quest.
  • Water Altar, a Runic altar.
  • Water Obelisk Island, a location.
  • Water Ravine Dungeon, a location.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
